  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

results.name: GrubDash Driver: Food Delivery Driver Simulator

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz AMD/Intel processor or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz AMD/Intel processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A gamepad is recommended but the game can easily be played with keyboard and mouse or just a keyboard.
